languages.text: Урбенд Драйвстем заботился о сохранении влияния своего рода больше, чем о благополучии протектората. Под гнетом собственных амбиций со временем он лишился губернаторского чина и уважения семьи. Спустя поколения один из крупнейших домов Даргонуса превратился в убогий род измельчавших аристократов.

Urbend Drivestem cared more about preserving the influence of his line than the well-being of the protectorate. His blind ambition lost him his governor's seat and the respect of his family. Within a few generations, one of the largest houses of Dargonus turned into an obscure family of petty aristocrats.
languages.original_text: Урбенд Драйвстем заботился о сохранении влияния своего рода больше, чем о благополучии протектората. Под гнетом собственных амбиций со временем он лишился губернаторского чина и уважения семьи. Спустя поколения один из крупнейших домов Даргонуса превратился в убогий род измельчавших аристократов.

traits.locale_text: Urbend Drivestem worried more about preserving the influence of his lineage than the well-being of the protectorate. Under the weight of his ambitions, he lost his governor's seat and the respect of his family. In several generations, one of the largest Houses of Dargonus turned into a husk of a family of petty aristocrats.

Urbend Drivestem worried more about preserving the influence of his lineage than the well-being of the protectorate. Under the weight of his ambitions, he lost his governor's seat and the respect of his family. In several generations, one of the largest Houses of Dargonus turned into a husk of a family of petty aristocrats.

Urbend Drivestem cared more about preserving the influence of his lineage than the well-being of the protectorate. His blind ambition lost him his governor's seat and the respect of his family. Within a few generations, one of the largest houses of Dargonus turned into a husk of a family of petty aristocrats.

Urbend Drivestem cared more about preserving the influence of his lineage than the well-being of the protectorate. His blind ambition lost him his governor's seat and the respect of his family. Within a few generations, one of the largest houses of Dargonus turned into a husk of a family of petty aristocrats.

Urbend Drivestem cared more about preserving the influence of his line than the well-being of the protectorate. His blind ambition lost him his governor's seat and the respect of his family. Within a few generations, one of the largest houses of Dargonus turned into an obscure family of petty aristocrats.

Urbend Drivestem cared more about preserving the influence of his line than the well-being of the protectorate. His blind ambition lost him his governor's seat and the respect of his family. Within a few generations, one of the largest houses of Dargonus turned into an obscure family of petty aristocrats.

languages.text: 厄本·德莱夫斯塔更关心的是如何保持他家族的影响力，而不是王朝的福祉。他盲目的野心最终导致他失去了总督的职位，他的家族也不再受人尊敬。仅仅过了几代人，这个曾一度跻身于达戈努斯名门的家族，便已然变得籍籍无名。
languages.original_text: Urbend Drivestem cared more about preserving the influence of his line than the well-being of the protectorate. His blind ambition lost him his governor's seat and the respect of his family. Within a few generations, one of the largest houses of Dargonus turned into an obscure family of petty aristocrats.

traits.locale_text: 厄本·德莱夫斯塔更关心的是如何保持他家族的影响力，而不是王朝的福祉。他盲目的野心最终导致他失去了总督的职位，他的家族也不再受人尊敬。仅仅过了几代人，这个曾一度跻身于达戈努斯最显赫家族之列的家族，便只剩下了一个小小的空壳。

languages.text: Urbend Drivestem war der Einfluss seiner Familie wichtiger als das Wohlergehen des Protektorats. Wegen seines blinden Ehrgeizes verlor er nicht nur das Amt des Gouverneurs, sondern auch den Respekt seiner Familie. Innerhalb weniger Generationen verwandelte sich eines der größten Häuser von Dargonus in eine obskure Familie unbedeutender Aristokraten.
languages.original_text: Urbend Drivestem cared more about preserving the influence of his line than the well-being of the protectorate. His blind ambition lost him his governor's seat and the respect of his family. Within a few generations, one of the largest houses of Dargonus turned into an obscure family of petty aristocrats.

traits.locale_text: Urbend Drivestem war der Einfluss seiner Familie wichtiger als das Wohlergehen des Protektorats. Wegen seines blinden Ehrgeizes verlor er nicht nur das Amt des Gouverneurs, sondern auch den Respekt seiner Familie. Innerhalb weniger Generationen verwandelte sich eines der größten Häuser von Dargonus in einen abgehalfterten Haufen unbedeutender Aristokraten.

languages.text: Urbend Drivestem avait plus à cœur de protéger l'influence de sa lignée que le bien-être de son protectorat. Son ambition aveugle lui coûta son siège de gouverneur ainsi que le respect de sa famille. En seulement quelques générations, l'une des plus grandes maisons de Dargonus fut réduite à une famille insignifiante d'aristocrates mesquins.
languages.original_text: Urbend Drivestem cared more about preserving the influence of his line than the well-being of the protectorate. His blind ambition lost him his governor's seat and the respect of his family. Within a few generations, one of the largest houses of Dargonus turned into an obscure family of petty aristocrats.

traits.locale_text: Urbend Drivestem avait plus à cœur de protéger l'influence de sa lignée que le bien-être de son protectorat. Son ambition aveugle lui coûta son siège de gouverneur ainsi que le respect de sa famille. En seulement quelques générations, l'une des plus grandes maisons de Dargonus fut réduite à une famille insignifiante d’aristocrates mesquins.

languages.text: Urbend Drivestem estaba más interesado en conservar la influencia de su familia que el bienestar de su protectorado. Su ambición ciega le hizo perder el puesto de gobernador y el respeto de su familia. En unas pocas generaciones, una de las mayores casas de Dargonus se había convertido en una familia desconocida de aristócratas insignificantes.
languages.original_text: Urbend Drivestem cared more about preserving the influence of his line than the well-being of the protectorate. His blind ambition lost him his governor's seat and the respect of his family. Within a few generations, one of the largest houses of Dargonus turned into an obscure family of petty aristocrats.

traits.locale_text: Urbend Drivestem estaba más interesado en conservar la influencia de su familia que el bienestar de su protectorado. Su ambición ciega le hizo perder el puesto de gobernador y el respeto de su familia. En unas pocas generaciones, una de las mayores casas de Dargonus se había convertido en una patética familia de aristócratas insignificantes.

languages.text: アーベント・ドライブステムは、保護領の繁栄よりも自身の家系の影響力を維持することを重視していた。彼の盲目的な野心により、総督の座と一族の尊敬を失った。数世代も経たないうちに、ダルゴナスで最大勢力を誇っていた家のひとつは、無名の小貴族に成り下がったのだ。
languages.original_text: Urbend Drivestem cared more about preserving the influence of his line than the well-being of the protectorate. His blind ambition lost him his governor's seat and the respect of his family. Within a few generations, one of the largest houses of Dargonus turned into an obscure family of petty aristocrats.

traits.locale_text: アーベント・ドライブステムは、保護領の繁栄よりも自身の家系の影響力を維持することを重視していた。彼の盲目的な野心により、総督の座と一族の尊敬を失った。数世代も経たないうちに、ダルゴナスで最大勢力を誇っていた家のひとつは、無名の小貴族に成り下がったのだ。

languages.text: Urbend Drivestem, soyunun nüfuzunu korumaya protektoranın iyiliğinden daha fazla değer veriyordu. Bu kör tutkusu yüzünden valilik koltuğunu ve ailesinin saygısını kaybetti. Birkaç nesil içinde Dargonus'un en büyük hanelerinden biri; sıradan aristokratlardan oluşan, unutulmuş bir aileye dönüştü.
languages.original_text: Urbend Drivestem cared more about preserving the influence of his line than the well-being of the protectorate. His blind ambition lost him his governor's seat and the respect of his family. Within a few generations, one of the largest houses of Dargonus turned into an obscure family of petty aristocrats.

traits.locale_text: Urbend Drivestem, soyunun sahip olduğu nüfuzu korumaya, protektoranın iyiliğinden daha fazla değer veriyordu. Bu kör tutkusu nedeniyle valilik koltuğunu ve ailesinin saygısını kaybetti. Birkaç nesil içinde Dargonus'un en büyük hanelerinden biri, sıradan aristokratlardan oluşan, unutulmuş bir aileye dönüştü.
